name: An exquisite whitewood staff (2h)
data: It has average weapon class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'order from chaos'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ordered mind'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'transmutation'.
